vault@orchold.name: vault
vault@orchold.examine: Someone installed this door after the Orcs got looted once too often.
vault@orchold.desc[2]:
Hmmmm....seems they installed a vault door to prevent rampant looting of their
precious treasure chamber.

orcgold@orchold.name: OrcGold
orcgold@orchold.examine:
It has an inscription on it which says, "To Owin, with love."  Scratched over
those words is the scrawl, "Orks robb dwarvs! Ha!"
orcgold@orchold.desc[0]: A gold plate lies on the floor here.

stonedoor@orchold.name: StoneDoor
stonedoor@orchold.desc[0]: A portion of the west wall is swung back, making a doorway.

chainmail@orchold.name: chainmail
chainmail@orchold.examine:
It appears well made.  The orcs must have have contracted someone else to
make it.
chainmail@orchold.desc[0]: A black shirt of chainmail is spread on the floor.

garbage@orchold.desc[1]: Garbage has been strewn all about the room.
garbage@orchold.name: garbage
garbage@orchold.desc[0]: Piles of garbage lie in the middle of the room.

block@orchold.name: block
block@orchold.examine: It's a hefty chunk of what appears to be solid gold.
block@orchold.desc[0]: A huge block of gold has been left lying here.

topcover@orchold.desc[1]: A large metal plate lies on the floor.
topcover@orchold.name: TopCover
topcover@orchold.examine: It's about one meter in diameter, and appears very heavy.
topcover@orchold.desc[0]: A metal cover lies alongside a passage leading down.

botcover@orchold.desc[1]: A metal cover blocks the top of the ladder.
botcover@orchold.name: BotCover
botcover@orchold.examine: It completely covers the hole in the ceiling, and appears very heavy.

switch@orchold.name: switch
switch@orchold.examine:
It's a small, carefully concealed switch, more proof that the orcs had help
building this place.
switch@orchold.desc[0]: There is a hole in the north wall.

stalactite@orchold.name: stalactite
stalactite@orchold.examine: It clings to the ceiling, unlike a stalagmite.
stalactite@orchold.desc[0]: A portion of the east wall is swung back, making a doorway.

holeorcs@orchold.name: HoleOrcs
holeorcs@orchold.desc[0]: There is a hole in the south wall leading to another room.

throne@orchold.name: throne
throne@orchold.examine:
It's quite an impressive affair: gold leaf, patterns in bas-relief, cushions
filled with down.  Upon close inspection you notice a switch hidden on the
arm of the chair.
throne@orchold.desc[0]: The throne of the King Orc looms before you.

hallway2@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway2@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway branches east, west, and south.

trap@orchold.title: Trap Room
trap@orchold.description:
This is the room where people foolish enough to fall through the trap door
above wind up.  Another room lies to the east.

hallway18@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway18@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads east and south.

guardroom@orchold.title: Orc Guardroom
guardroom@orchold.description:
This is apparently where the guards go to change when they go on or off
duty.  The smell in the room is almost intolerable.  A ladder leads up to the
ceiling, and passages lead west and north.

observation@orchold.title: Observation Room
observation@orchold.description:
This room was obviously designed for spying on people entering the hallway.
You notice a hole in the western wall through which the hallway can be seen.

hallway15@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway15@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads west and south.

hallway13@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway13@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads west and north.

throne@orchold.title: Orc Throne Room
throne@orchold.description:
In stark contrast to the rest of the orcs' lair, this room is grandeur and
tack epitomized.  The walls are paved in gold, and at the north end of the
room sits an incredibly ornate throne.  Heavy curtains cover an opening to
the south.

path1@orchold.title: Trampled Path
path1@orchold.description:
You stand on a steep upwards path.  The path has obviously been made by the
trampling of many feet rather than by any plan.  Below you lies the end of the
mountain pass.

path2@orchold.title: Trampled Path
path2@orchold.description:
A large opening in the mountainside lies above you.  The path continues
below you.

tunnel@orchold.title: Secret Tunnel
tunnel@orchold.description:
This appears to be an escape route for the king in times of trouble.
A passage leads west, and you can see light to the north.

smooth@orchold.title: Smooth Hallway
smooth@orchold.description:
This hallway shows definite signs of outside contracting.  It is smooth
and well worked.  Unfortunately, it's still damp and filthy and smells like
garbage.  The hallway continues north, and becomes rough again to the west.

hallway1@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway1@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads north and south.

treasury@orchold.title: King Orc's Treasury
treasury@orchold.description:
This is apparently where the King Orc likes to store his valuables.  The
room itself is quite plain, and the layer of dust over everything indicates
that the king probably hasn't had very many additions to his collection
recently.

entryway@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Entryway
entryway@orchold.description:
You stand at the entrance to a lair apparently carved out of the side of
the mountain.  The work on the rock is very poorly done, and blackness beyond
feels oppressive.  A path winds steeply downwards beneath you and the opening
leads to the north.

audience@orchold.title: Audience Waiting Room
audience@orchold.description:
This appears to be where people wait to see the Orc King.  Benches line
the walls for subjects to sit on.  A set of curtains cover an opening in the
north wall, and would be quite impressive were it not for the mold growing on
them.  A hallway leads south.

hallway5@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway5@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway branches east, west, and south.

hallway9@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway9@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads north and east.

central@orchold.title: Central Chamber
central@orchold.description:
This is apparently the main place for the orcs to congregate.  The room
reeks of filth and decay.  Hallways lead north, east, and west.

hallway6@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway6@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads south and opens into a large chamber to the east.

overgrown@orchold.title: Overgrown Path
overgrown@orchold.description:
You are on what could almost be called a path, treading your way through
vines, rocks, and the like.  The path becomes clearer and flatter farther
down.  It is far too steep to go up the mountainside.

hallway7@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway7@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads north and west.

hallway3@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway3@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads north, west and east.

hallway16@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway16@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads east, and to the west enters a large chamber.

hallway11@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway11@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway branches east, west, and north.

hallway12@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway12@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads east and south.

hallway4@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway4@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway branches north, south, and west.

hallway17@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway17@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads north, and to the south enters a large chamber.

mountainside@orchold.title: Steep Mountainside
mountainside@orchold.description:
You are outside on the mountain.  A hole in the side of the moutain lies to
the south, barely distinguishable from the plants covering it.  The grade is
extremely steep, but it looks like you can skitter your way down.

damp@orchold.title: Damp Hallway
damp@orchold.description:
This hallway shows the same poor craftsmanship as the rest of the compound.
Water drips from a large &+Cstalactite&* near the eastern wall, making the whole
room damp and uncomfortable.  The hallway continues north and south.

hallway14@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway14@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway branches north, west, and south.

hallway8@orchold.title: Rough-hewn Hallway
hallway8@orchold.description:
Like most orc-built hallways, this one is crooked, rough, and damp.
The hallway leads east and south.

usher@orchold.name: usher
usher@orchold.description: The Usher Orc, dressed in black livery, sneers down his nose at you.

maggot@orchold.name: maggot
maggot@orchold.description: A giant maggot slithers around, leaving a slimy trail behind him.

watchman@orchold.name: watchman
watchman@orchold.description: The Watchman Orc growls at you.

randy@orchold.name: randy
randy@orchold.description: Randy Orc looks at you viciously.

brandy@orchold.name: brandy
brandy@orchold.description: Brandy Orc looks at you viciously.

andy@orchold.name: andy
andy@orchold.description: Andy Orc looks at you viciously.

sandy@orchold.name: Sandy
sandy@orchold.description: Sandy Orc looks at you viciously.

king@orchold.name: king
king@orchold.description: Harold the King Orc glares at you with a look of royal intolerance.

mandy@orchold.name: mandy
mandy@orchold.description: Mandy Orc looks at you viciously.
